story_29_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
It’s been a while since I’ve been approached like
that on the street.
story_29_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Kinda nice, though, right? Havin’ all those people
supportin’ you like that.
story_29_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Your big speech yesterday must’ve made an
impression on them. They can see how much
you’ve grown.
story_29_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Come on! Let’s go win this thing and give the
crowd what they’re hoping for!
story_29_03000/2401_1001_0500_10: Of course! That’s exactly what I plan to do.
story_29_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
That Trainer... Didn’t he appear in the tournament
at some point?
story_29_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
He did. I think his name’s Paulo, if I
remember correctly.
story_29_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
He lost to [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team in
round two. Is something going on with him?
story_29_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: He just...had a weird look in his eye.
story_29_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: Hmm... How weird are we talkin’?
story_29_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: I don’t know. Something just feels...off about him.
